title: Create dating and relationship application

requirements.text: Create a user profile system where users can register and create profiles with basic information including name, age, bio, and interests
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create a profile with name, age, bio, and interests
Profile data is persisted in the backend
Users can view and edit their own profile

requirements.text: Implement a profile browsing interface where users can view other users' profiles with their information and photos
acceptanceCriteria: Users can browse through other user profiles
Each profile displays the user's information clearly
Navigation between profiles is smooth and intuitive

requirements.text: Create a matching system where users can express interest in other profiles and see mutual matches
acceptanceCriteria: Users can like or pass on profiles
System identifies and displays mutual matches
Match data is stored and retrievable from backend

requirements.text: Implement a messaging interface where matched users can send text messages to each other
acceptanceCriteria: Matched users can send messages to each other
Messages are displayed in a conversation view
Message history is persisted and retrievable

requirements.text: Design a modern, romantic visual theme with warm colors, elegant typography, and a welcoming layout that creates an inviting atmosphere for connection and relationship-building
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design uses warm, romantic color palette
Layout creates a welcoming user experience
Design is consistent across all pages

constraints: Must comply with platform content policies
No explicit adult content or inappropriate imagery
Must use Internet Identity for authentication

required: Romantic hero banner image with warm sunset tones and silhouettes (hero-banner.dim_1200x600.png)
Heart icon for like/match actions in modern style (heart-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Message bubble icon for chat interface (message-icon.dim_48x48.png)
Profile placeholder avatar with neutral aesthetic (profile-placeholder.dim_200x200.png)
